Before Christmas, I was working on the linear map case, and had some issues with the simplifier. Once I'm back at my workstation, I'll see if either the simplifier can be made smarter, or I can realign the classes so they work.

The simplifier is now smarter and the start of the subobject refactor #11545 is building. Hopefully I get some time to actually finish everything in the next couple of weeks...
